column4: how can i use dpkg to install/reinstall aptitude if it is corrupted or failing?
ok, i reinstalled aptitude with apt-get remove aptitude && apt-get install aptitude and now aptitude works fine
but apt-get still doesn't work it says: E: Invalid operation safe-upgrade
well no...aptitude works but apt-get still isn't
safe-upgrade is an option to aptitude, not apt. "apt-get upgrade" is basically the same (actually a bit more conservative than aptitude's 'safe-upgrade').
